creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
description: outdoor scene with stick figure-like people in foreground, some standing and some seated on benches, looking out over water with black boats; black night sky with large yellow moon; small building in LLC; text along right edge in white on black, blue and red; sheet mounted to cardboard
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Sceneries of Kobe in the Twelve Months (Kōbe jūnikagetsu fūkei 神戸十二ヶ月風景)
title: September: Full Moon at Suwayama
